rComments: fun, passionate, laid back, understanding, easy, if you see prof. bearns on the sched. of classes, TAKE THIS COURSE! you won't be disappointed!!!

Professor Bearns shows a great enthusiasm and interest of the content through his lectures. He welcomes all sorts of contributions from students. Very relaxed and chill professor, yet he is still respected by his students. He's a witty and funny guy as well. Very friendly and helpful. Cool guy.Professor by day, rockstar at night
